title: How can I cast HBO GO from my Pixel One, without Chrome cast ?
content:
Hello,

I have a Pixel One, and I subscribed two days a go to the HBO Go Platform.
I cannot cast anything from this HBO Go app to my Panasonic TV.
I don't have a chromecast device.
I can easily cast anything from YouTube from my Pixel to my TV. ( thanks to the cast button ).
There is no cast button in the HBO Go app.

Can you please tell me how can I cast HBO Go in my conditions, or should I buy a Chromecast device ?

Thank you in advance
Have a nice day
Cipi
